Welcome to Dutch Blitz Scorer!

Please note that you must own the physical Dutch Blitz card game for this app to be useful. This app is designed to make scoring for Dutch Blitz simpler. This app is not associated or endorsed by the manufacturer of the Dutch Blitz card game.

Quick Start Guide

1. To start a new game, press New Game on the main screen
2. Configure your game settings and press Start Game to begin
3. After each round of Dutch Blitz, press Record new round to record the scores

Review or resume games on the main screen, long press on a game to delete it.

Help with app

Feel free to contact me at any time through the Contact Developer button on the Settings screen. If you need help with traversing the app, you can always press the Help icon at the top right of each screen.

The rules of Dutch Blitz are not explained in this app. It is expected that you have someone in your group that is familiar with the rules of the game. For reference, here is a link to the Wikipedia page.

Reporting bugs

If you see any bugs, please report them to me through the Contact Developer button on the Settings screen. Please attach any screenshots of the issue if possible. I\'ll try to look into them as soon as possible!

Other info

This app is free and open-source. There are no ads and there never will be. Feel free to visit the source code on Github.
